divs: Sighting Detailsduring superbowl when lights went out i went outside for a smoke and i was walking back in to house when i saw a glowing ball get bright and then dim and then it got really bright and then it was gone... i have now idea what it was but i know it wasn't a plane or a heli or anything i have ever seen before... after i saw a helicopter buzzing around that area... it was kinda weird and i was not a fan of it...
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around February 3rd 2013
